data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 189,263, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Iğdır, Turkey

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Iğdır, Turkey.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.section_summary: On average, 11 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Iğdır, Turkey.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 71 believers in Iğdır, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Iğdır a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Uzbek, Southern people might believe through him.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Iğdır, Turkey that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 71 believers in Iğdır, Turkey a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Iğdır, Turkey know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
